title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 674.11 - Special provisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 674.11 - Special provisions

State Regulations
(a) At any
time prior to approving or disapproving the water resources management
strategy, the council or the ALJ may direct that the hearing record be
reopened. This may be done to secure additional information or data, or to
consider significant new evidence. (b) The hearing conducted pursuant to this

Part shall not be considered an adjudicatory proceeding as defined in section
102(3) of the State Administrative Procedure Act, or a rule making proceeding
held pursuant to section 102(1) of such act. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
674.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
